Grade: 90

Comment: The student provided a thorough and well-explained list of Bible verses that offer insight into the concept of resurrection. They demonstrated a deep understanding of the topic and effectively linked each verse to the broader theme of resurrection and its significance in Christian beliefs. The additional verses beyond those in the reference answer shows a keen engagement with the topic and a comprehensive examination of the concept of resurrection in the Scriptures. This thorough exploration aligns well with the concern of grounding beliefs in authoritative Christian texts.
